name: Ur'land: The Desert Escape
description:
Ur'land: The Desert Escape is an innovative First/Third Person game, in which we attempt to escape the chasing enemies in harsh desert environment. Switch between driving and shooting, but be aware that each switch takes 10 seconds. You can't drive and shoot at the same time, so choose wisely or face the consequences. Controls: W – Accelerate S – Brake A – Turn Left D – Turn Right LMB – Fire SPACE/ENTER – mode switch

Made during TK GameJam 2016 in 48h
